name: wurdweb (itch)
description:
Cross words & Make Webs

Grab words from a list and cross them with words on the board. Puzzle your way towards a Finish Tile, put down enough words, or put down as many words as you can!

Puzzles are generated by an algorithm; you just tell it what you want, and voilà.

wurdweb features 3 game modes:

  • Tangle Mode, where you need to put down 15 words, which you will only be able to do if you pick up enough extra words.
  • Precise Mode, where puzzles are completed by placing a word on a Finish Tile, and only an exact placement of words will get you there.
  • Daily, Weekly and Monthly Mode, where you put down as many words as you can and compete with other players - if you want.

Not everyone understands English; wurdweb is for those people too.

wurdweb can generate puzzles in the following languages:

  • Dutch
  • English (U.K.)
  • English (U.S.)
  • French (Canada)
  • French (France)
  • German
  • Italian
  • Portuguese (Brazil)
  • Russian
  • Spanish (Latin America)
  • Turkish

wurdweb's got a lot of STUFF in it for extra FUN.

  • Choose from 20+ word themes, some of which are rather… peculiar.
  • Challenge yourself with plenty of puzzle variations.
  • Cute little characters who walk around in your puzzles doing absolutely nothing.
  • Play with controllers compatible with your device.

wurdweb is designed by Aran Koning and Adriaan de Jongh, two game designers and friends from the Netherlands.
